comments:
org.eclipse.jst.validation.sample plugin, so I don't know how bad a problem this is.

The doc for IResource.getFileExtension() states that it can return null.

Reversing the existing .equals check should fix it:

if(!"properties".equals(res.getFileExtension())) { //$NON-NLS-1$
	return false; 		
}
Fix released, will be available in 07/21 I Build.
